releases.changelog:
### Features
- New testing features for upcoming release
- Experimental dashboard module
- Beta reporting tools
- Preview export functionality

### Improvements
- UI refinements based on user feedback
- Backend performance tweaks
- API endpoint optimizations
- Database connection pooling

### Fixes
- Fixed intermittent crashes in data module
- Resolved login timeout issues
- Corrected report formatting bugs
- Addressed memory consumption spikes

### Testing Notes
- This is a development build for internal testing
- Not recommended for production use
- Contains experimental features that may change
- Feedback welcome for upcoming stable release
